I FELT DRUNK AT WORK FASTED PANICKED LOSING JOBS MAY BE A CURSE MAY BE WITCH CRAFT YEAR 2006 I WENT TO WINNERS CHAPEL CHURCHES BY BISHOP DR DAVID OYEDEPO NIGERIA KENYA AFRICA WORLD WIDE NAIROBI CITY OFFICE CHURCH KENYA AN ASSISTANT PASTOR ANOINTED ME PRAYED FOR ME GAVE ME ISIAH 45 THE YEARS I HAVE WEPT HOPELESSNESS TO FASTING GHOSTS CLAIM THAT MY MOTHER USED PIRITON SEMI GENIUS OVER WORKING PUBLIC SHOW TO MAKE ME PROPHETIC GOD HAS 1 MILLION PEOPLE WHITE PEOPLE WORLD WIDE GODLY WHO ARE MILLIONAIRES FROM ZERO NOTHING WHO HAVE NEVER WEPT GOD SHOWS ME WHY THE KORAN IS STILL THEIR PEOPLE LIKE ME OUR TESTIMONIES CREAT CULTS THE REST PRINCESS DIANA STORIES ARE JOKES OF WHITE PEOPLE CIA GAMES WHEN YOU FORCE PEOPLD TO FAST MYSTREY STAGES FALSE HOPELESSNESS THEY BECOME PROPHETIC GET CIA JOBS CNN BBC DETECTIVE NEWS REPORTERS ITS ADICTIVE THEY SEE DREAMS BUT BECOME REJECTS NO BODY WANTS TO PARTNER WITH THEM BUSNESS GOD REMOVED THE OFFICE OF PROPHETS THEY ARE JUST PASTORS SECRET PROPHECIES PERSONAL VISIONS IT MAKES POOR PASTORS GREAT REJECTION I WAS ASKING ABOUT FALSE PROPHETS CULTS PANIC THAT TAKE MILLIONS OF PEOPLE TO HELL MEDIA BOOKS ETC STOLEN WEALTH A CURSE OF WITCH CRAFT ISRALITES WORSHIPPED A GOLDERN CALF JEHOVAH WITNESS IS CIA GAMES ANTI ISLAM LIKE CATHOLIC CHURCH THEY DONT HAVE ANY SPIRITUAL VISION HOW WILL GOD JUDGE US WHEN HE HAS MIXED TRUTHS AND DECEPTION YOU SHALL KNOW THEM BY THEIR FRUITS JIHARDISTS WHO DIE FOR ALLAH WHAT ARE THEIR FRUITS A JEHOVAH WANYONYI KENYA CIA POLICE OFFICERS MILLIONAIRES WHO STEAL WITCH CRAFT ILUSIONS WHO QUESTION WHY JESUS HAD KIDS ETC IN OUR VILLAGE THEIR IS A DINI YA MSAMBWA WHO PRACTICE TRADITIONAL RELIGION JUDAISM BUKUSU CULTURE THROW DEMONS AT PEOPLE CLAIMS THAT EVEN A NEAR BY SCHOOL HAS BEEN CLOSED WHAT A PANIC HEBREW STUDY WELE KHAKABA JEHOVAH JIREH IF IT HAS DECEPTION THEN CULTS WITCH CRAFT MILLIONAIRES CIA SECRET SOCIETIES KENYA YOU HAVE NO BODY WITH ANY WITCH DOCTORS CURSE STOLEN WEALTH MILLIONS OF CURENCY YOU CANT JOIN THEM LIKE HOMOSEXUAL SOCIETIES NEXT DOOR AND YOUR KIDS PANIC PROSTITUTION GHOSTS CLAIM THAT MY FASTING IS A WASTE OF TIME I FASTED FOR 4 YEARS BREAKING AND CONTINUEING I WANTED TO BE OUT OF JOBS TO GO FASTING BECOUSE OF DREAMS STOLEN WEALTH GHOSTS WITCH DOCTORS CURSE PUBLIC WARNING MY CASE IS REJECTION WHITE PEOPLE MADE SURE THAT MY GENERATION BECOMES MILLIONAIRES WORLD PRESIDENCY WHITE RACE FREEMASONARY SKULL AND BONES TO BLOCK FUTURE DECEPTION OIL WORLD BANK SECRETS MY WIFE IT REACHES A TIME WHEN WE HAVE WHITE PEOPLE AND AFRICANS NO MILLIONAIRES OTHER RACES NOT IMPORTANT EG FORD BMW SELLS TOYOTA CAR PARTS TOYOTA MAKES 10% PROFIT BRAND NAMES CHINESE MANUFACTURED GOODS LIKE SAFARICOM CELL PHONE KENYA ARE VODA FONE WHITE RACE RULES

I lost my national identity card number 13155234 afew days ago im yet to renew it I usually trek to kitale town kenya a 13 kilometers walk meditation idears come i do window shopping in super markets as a chef i compare prices of utensils research today i walked in to Transmatress super market 2nd floor owned by indians a slender man kikuyu tribe looking face ordered me out of the super market threatened to call the police and told me that next time he sees me there he will call police i had a black leather cap dark sun glasses a blue shirt black jeans trouser brown sports shoes my blue rain coat had been left at the luggage area out side the super market i panicked no cell phone to call relatives in case of pain no ID Card kindly post your coments on evans wafula.com may be they dont like idle window shoppers terorist alert harassment remember to carry your ID CARD AND CELL PHONE DONT GIVE UP

Born to win

There was a time year 2005 a chef at Nairobi Hilton Hotel earning 4 us dollars per day my mountain bike my room in kibera slums largest slum in Africa i t had no power it had public toilets muddy when it rained crowded i used to think of heaven we are gods psalms bible koran spirit wind Gods diversitz generations flesh ghosts can not creat computer magic we compete but remain friends foot ball when you are poor you dream heaven when rich you want to reach 100years i had a dream i was age 125 with great grand children who will want inheritance God created me to creat generations not to run to heaven becouse of pain but why do people suffer why cant God take all of us to heaven where there is no pain what makes God God is not us in heaven heaven has trillions of angels some rebelled from heaven became demons negotiations stand off continues To be like God is to be great on earth kings princess royal priest hood
